name: Shazam
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

api_methods.name: songs/get-count
api_methods.description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

utterances.utterance: How many times has the song with key 40333609 been detected?
Can you tell me the total number of detections for the song identified by key 12345678?
What is the total count of detections for the song with key 98765432?
How many times has the song with key 55555555 been Shazamed?
Get the total number of detections for the song with key 11111111.
What is the detection count for the song identified by key 22222222?
Can you provide the total number of Shazams for the song with key 33333333?
How many times has the song with key 44444444 been detected by Shazam?
What is the total detection count for the song with key 66666666?
Get the number of times the song with key 77777777 has been Shazamed.
